role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Microsoft Office on Windows/Mac OS X and installs LibreOffice on Linux
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Microsoft Office on Windows/Mac OS X and installs LibreOffice on Linux. Microsoft Office, or simply Office, is a family of client software, server software, and services developed by Microsoft. LibreOffice is a free and open-source office productivity software suite, a project of The Document Foundation. It was forked in 2010 from OpenOffice.org, which was an open-sourced version of the earlier StarOffice.
